title: Ads Designer/ Creative Strategist ( Static eCommerce Ads )
job_overview:
Are you a visual storyteller with a knack for eCommerce? We’re hiring a static Ads Designer / Creative Strategist to help us create scroll-stopping, high-performing ads for DTC brands.

What You’ll Do:
- Design static ad creatives for Meta, TikTok, and other paid media platforms

- Collaborate with marketing teams to align visuals with strategy and brand voice

- Analyze ad performance and iterate based on what converts

- Research trends and competitors to keep creatives fresh and relevant


What You’ll Need:
- Experience designing ad creatives for eCommerce brands

- A strategic eye—you care about what works, not just what looks good

- Strong skills in Figma, Canva, Adobe Suite, or similar tools


Working hours are flexible but there needs to be an overlap with the UK time zone.
If interested please submit your recent portfolio and CV to be considered.
